title: Cross-sell New Product Module
description: The company releases a new 'Advanced Analytics' module. An Account Manager contacts existing customers to sell them the new add-on.

tasks.description: Generate a list of customers who would be good candidates for the new module based on their usage patterns.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a target list of customers who frequently use the standard reporting features.

tasks.description: Contact a target customer and demonstrate the new 'Advanced Analytics' module.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent effectively shows the value of the new module.

tasks.description: Process the order to add the new module to the customer's existing subscription.
